name: sweet summer sunflower bag
notes:
includes instructions to crochet a beautiful granny style sunflower handbag.

a fun, crochet purse pattern!

***please note that this pattern is available for free on my blog www.crochet365knittoo.com. the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read, printable, and ad-free version of the pattern. ***

materials needed:
- worsted weight yarn (exact brand and color provided)
- crochet hook size g
- tapestry needle for weaving in ends.

the purse is 11 inches wide by 19 inches tall (including handles)

pattern is written in english, using standard american terms 

level: advanced beginner.
